text: Kassai is the surname of the following people: *Ervin Kassai (1925–2012), Hungarian basketball referee *Fernander Kassaï (born 1987), Central African footballer *Hassan Kassai (1928–2012), Iranian classical musician *István Kassai (born 1959), Hungarian pianist *Lajos Kassai (born 1960), Hungarian archer *Viktor Kassai (born 1975), Hungarian football referee ==See also== *Kasai (surname) Category:Hungarian-language surnames
title: Kassai (surname)
